title: generate添加RepetitionPenaltyLogitsProcessor
body:
需求：
添加`RepetitionPenaltyLogitsProcessor`,目前只实现了`MinLengthLogitsProcessor`.
```python
    @staticmethod
    def get_logits_processor(min_length=None, eos_token_id=None):
        processors = LogitsProcessorList()
        if min_length is not None and eos_token_id is not None and min_length > -1:
            processors.append(
                MinLengthLogitsProcessor(min_length, eos_token_id))
        # TODO
        # Add more pre_processing for distribution

        return processors
```
# 供参考的实现方法。
- 方法1使用了for循环，速度较慢。
- 方法2方法速度较快。
```python

class RepetitionPenaltyLogitsProcessor(LogitsProcessor):
    r"""
    enforcing an exponential penalty on repeated sequences.
    Args:
        repetition_penalty (:obj:`float`):
            The parameter for repetition penalty. 1.0 means no penalty. See `this paper
            <https://arxiv.org/pdf/1909.05858.pdf>`__ for more details.
    """

    def __init__(self, penalty: float):
        if not isinstance(penalty, float) or not (penalty > 0):
            raise ValueError(f"`penalty` has to be a strictly positive float, but is {penalty}")

        self.penalty = penalty

    def __call__(self, input_ids, logits):
        # method 1
        # score = paddle.index_sample(logits, input_ids)
        # score = paddle.where(score < 0, score * self.penalty, score / self.penalty)
        # outputs = [paddle.scatter(logit,input_id,score_) for logit,input_id,score_ in zip(logits,input_ids,score)]
        # return paddle.stack(outputs,axis=0)

        # method2
        score = paddle.index_sample(logits, input_ids)
        score = paddle.where(score < 0, score * self.penalty, score / self.penalty)
        input_ids = input_ids + paddle.arange(logits.shape[
            0]).unsqueeze(-1) * logits.shape[-1]
        return paddle.scatter(logits.flatten(),input_ids.flatten(),score.flatten()).reshape(logits.shape)

```

title: 【论文复现】lstm无法与torch对齐
body:
在torch中:
rnn = nn.LSTM(n_in, n_out, 1, batch_first=True, bidirectional=False)

输出的权重keys：
**odict_keys(['weight_ih_l0', 'weight_hh_l0', 'bias_ih_l0', 'bias_hh_l0'])**

在paddle中：
rnn = nn.LSTM(n_in, n_out, 1, time_major=False, direction="forward")

输出的权重keys：

**odict_keys(['weight_ih_l0', 'weight_hh_l0', 'bias_ih_l0', 'bias_hh_l0', '0.cell.weight_ih', '0.cell.weight_hh', '0.cell.bias_ih', '0.cell.bias_hh'])**

会多出0.cell的权重， 怎么保持一致？ 可将num_layers设置成0么？

title: 关于多个任务的预训练模型的迁移学习
body:
Hi Team，

当有多个下游任务需要fine-tuning并且都使用ernie-gram时，预训练+下游任务模型一起调优时， 相同的预训练模型会或多或少发生变化， 这样当保存模型或者部署的时候将都需要同时保存或部署， 那么有没有一种方式可以只保存变化的部分呢， 看到下图有一种adapter的迁移学习模式（Parameter-Efficient Transfer Learning for NLP  https://arxiv.org/abs/1902.00751）似乎在解决这样的问题， 那么我的问题是，当前paddlenlp有提供这样的能力吗？

Thanks!

title: 【PaddlePaddle Hackathon】PaddleNLP 任务合集
body:
# 【PaddlePaddle Hackathon】PaddleNLP 任务合集

hi，大家好，非常高兴的告诉大家，首届 PaddlePaddle Hackathon 开始啦。PaddlePaddle Hackathon 是面向全球开发者的深度学习领域编程活动，鼓励开发者了解与参与 PaddlePaddle。本次共有四大方向（PaddlePaddle、Paddle Family、Paddle Friends、Paddle Anything）四大方向，共计100个任务共大家完成。详细信息可以参考 [PaddlePaddle Hackathon 说明](https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/contributionguide?docPath=hackathon_cn)。大家是否已经迫不及待了呢~

本 ISSUE 是 Paddle Family 专区 PaddleNLP 方向任务合集。具体任务列表如下：

| 序号 | 难度 | 任务 ISSUE                                                    |
| ---- | ---- | :-----------------------------------------------------: |
| 50 | ⭐️⭐️⭐️  | [基于 PaddleNLP 语义索引实现 Gradient Cache 策略，实现超大 batch 语义索引模型训练](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1080)           |                    |          |
| 51 | ⭐️⭐️   | [在 PaddleNLP 中新增 BertJapaneseTokenizer，新增Bert Japanese模型预训练权重](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1079)           |                    |          |
| 52 | ⭐️⭐️   | [在 PaddleNLP 中完善Bert模型下游任务代码，新增Bert预训练权重](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1078)           |                    |          |
| 53 | ⭐️⭐️   | [在 PaddleNLP 中完善BigBird模型下游任务代码](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1077)           |                    |          |
| 54 | ⭐️⭐️   | [在 PaddleNLP 中完善Electra模型下游任务代码，新增Electra预训练权重](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1076)           |                    |          |
| 55 | ⭐️⭐️   | [在 PaddleNLP 中完善Roberta模型下游任务代码，新增Roberta预训练权重](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1075)           |                    |          |
| 56 | ⭐️⭐️   | [在 PaddleNLP 中完善GPT模型下游任务代码，新增GPT预训练权重](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1074)           |                    |          |
| 57 | ⭐️⭐️   |[在 PaddleNLP 中完善XLNet模型下游任务代码，新增DistilBert预训练权重](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/issues/1073)            |                    |          |

若想要认领本次活动任务，请至 [PaddlePaddle Hackathon Pinned ISSUE](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/issues/35940) 完成任务 ISSUE 认领。

活动官网：[PaddlePaddle Hackathon](https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/PaddlePaddleHackathon?fr=paddlenlpg)

title: 【PaddlePaddle Hackathon】50、基于 PaddleNLP 语义索引实现 Gradient Cache 策略，实现超大 batch 语义索引模型训练
body:
（此 ISSUE 为 PaddlePaddle Hackathon 活动的任务 ISSUE，更多详见[PaddlePaddle Hackathon](https://www.paddlepaddle.org.cn/PaddlePaddleHackathon)）

【任务说明】

- 任务标题：基于 PaddleNLP 语义索引实现 Gradient Cache 策略，实现超大 batch 语义索引模型训练

- 技术标签：python、语义索引

- 任务难度：困难

- 详细描述：语义索引模型的效果受 batch_size 影响很大，一般 batch_size 越大模型效果越好，但是受限于 GPU 显存大小，batch_size 在普通硬件上往往无法开到很大；这篇 paper(Paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2101.06983.pdf) 提出的 Gradient Cache 算法可以有效扩展 batch_size , 在显存较小条件下也能实现大 batch 语义索引模型训练。

【提交内容】

- 任务 PR 到 [PaddleNLP](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP)

- 相关技术文档（模型效果验证符合预期）

【技术要求】

- 熟练掌握 python

- 理解深度学习模型原理

- 了解语义索引模型基础算法(非必须)

【参考资料】

- paper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2101.06983.pdf

- github: https://github.com/luyug/GradCache

- 了解预训练语言模型

body:
Version: PaddleNLP==2.0.8, PaddlePaddle==2.1.3
Env: Linux Ubuntu 18.04 , GPU

examples/text_classification/pretrained_models/train.py 
The original file is:

```
train_ds, dev_ds = load_dataset("thucnews", splits=["train", "dev"])

model = ppnlp.transformers.ErnieForSequenceClassification.from_pretrained('ernie-tiny', num_classes=len(train_ds.label_list))

'ernie-tiny')
```

title: 【论文复现】数据加载DataLoader内存泄漏问题
body:
[关联ISSUE](https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/Paddle/issues/35749#issue-996638344)

环境
```
paddlepaddle-gpu                  2.1.3
paddlenlp                         2.0.0
Linux centos 3.10.0-1127.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Mar 31 23:36:51 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

内存检查工具：
pip install memory_profiler 
```

随着训练，内存不断增大，内存占满后程序中断
给了两种模式下的不同数据预处理方式下的对比；`main_nlp_wo_leak` 未产生内存泄漏，`main_nlp_w_leak`  在下一轮 `Dataloader`遍历中存在内存未被回收的情况
手动增加内存的代码如下，为example新增内容：
```python
example.update({
        'input_ids': np.zeros((100000)),
        'token_type_ids': np.zeros((100000))
    })
```

例子如下：
```python
import numpy as np
import paddle
from memory_profiler import profile

paddle.set_device('cpu')
from functools import partial

from paddle.io import BatchSampler, DataLoader, Dataset
from paddlenlp.data import Dict, Pad, Stack
from paddlenlp.datasets import load_dataset
from paddlenlp.transformers import BertTokenizer


class RandomDataset(Dataset):
    def __init__(self, num_samples):
        self.num_samples = num_samples

    def __getitem__(self, idx):
        example = {}
        example['str'] = "demo"
        example['label'] = "yes"
        return example

    def __len__(self):
        return self.num_samples

class DataCollatorDemo(object):
    def __init__(self, tokenizer):
        self.tokenizer = tokenizer
        
    def __call__(self, examples):
        # examples: (list)
        batch = []
        for example in examples:
            example.update({
                'input_ids': np.zeros((100000)),
                'token_type_ids': np.zeros((100000))
            })
            label = np.zeros((1))
            batch.append({
                "input_ids": example['input_ids'],
                "token_type_ids": example['token_type_ids'],
                "label": label.copy()
            })
        
        return batch
    
# @profile
def convert_example_nlp(example, tokenizer):
    example.update({
        'input_ids': np.zeros((100000)),
        'token_type_ids': np.zeros((100000))
    })
    return {
        "input_ids": example['input_ids'],
        "token_type_ids": example['token_type_ids'],
        "label": [1]
    }
    # return {
    #     "input_ids": np.zeros((100000)), #! wo leak
    #     "token_type_ids": np.zeros((100000)),
    #     "label": [1]
    # }

@profile
def main_nlp_w_leak():
    tokenizer = BertTokenizer.from_pretrained('bert-base-chinese')
    train_ds = load_dataset('lcqmc', splits='train')

    #! 内存泄漏
    trans_func = partial(
        convert_example_nlp,
        tokenizer=tokenizer)
    train_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=True)
    # 使用Dict函数将Pad，Stack等函数与数据中的键值相匹配
    train_batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Dict({
        'input_ids': Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),
        'token_type_ids': Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),
        'label': Stack(dtype="int64")
    }): fn(samples) #! pad 后产生的内存也没被回收
    train_batch_sampler = BatchSampler(train_ds, batch_size=2, shuffle=True)
    train_data_loader = DataLoader(dataset=train_ds, batch_sampler=train_batch_sampler, num_workers=0, collate_fn=train_batchify_fn) #! 内存泄漏

    i = 0
    for example in train_data_loader:
        i += 1
        if i > 100:
            break
    del i


@profile
def main_nlp_wo_leak():
    tokenizer = BertTokenizer.from_pretrained('bert-base-chinese')
    train_ds = load_dataset('lcqmc', splits='train')

    #! 内存不泄漏, 区别在于，此处没有map，在collate_fn中做预处理
    data_collator = DataCollatorDemo(tokenizer=tokenizer)
    train_batch_sampler = BatchSampler(train_ds, batch_size=2, shuffle=True)
    train_data_loader = DataLoader(dataset=train_ds, batch_sampler=train_batch_sampler, num_workers=0, collate_fn=data_collator)

    i = 0
    for example in train_data_loader:
        i += 1
        if i > 100:
            break
    del i

    
if __name__ == "__main__":
    # =================================================    
    main_nlp_w_leak() # !不会回收内存
    main_nlp_wo_leak() #! 会回收内存

```

程序输出结果如下：
```

Line #    Mem usage    Increment  Occurences   Line Contents
============================================================
    65    241.7 MiB    241.7 MiB           1   @profile
    66                                         def main_nlp_w_leak():
    67    244.6 MiB      2.9 MiB           1       tokenizer = BertTokenizer.from_pretrained('bert-base-chinese')
    68    354.4 MiB    109.8 MiB           1       train_ds = load_dataset('lcqmc', splits='train')
    69                                         
    70                                             #! 内存泄漏
    71    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       trans_func = partial(
    72    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1           convert_example_nlp,
    73    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1           tokenizer=tokenizer)
    74    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       train_ds.map(trans_func, lazy=True)
    75                                             # 使用Dict函数将Pad，Stack等函数与数据中的键值相匹配
    76    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       train_batchify_fn = lambda samples, fn=Dict({
    77    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1           'input_ids': Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_id),
    78    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1           'token_type_ids': Pad(axis=0, pad_val=tokenizer.pad_token_type_id),
    79    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1           'label': Stack(dtype="int64")
    80                                             }): fn(samples) #! pad 后产生的内存也没被回收
    81    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       train_batch_sampler = BatchSampler(train_ds, batch_size=2, shuffle=True)
    82    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       train_data_loader = DataLoader(dataset=train_ds, batch_sampler=train_batch_sampler, num_workers=0, collate_fn=train_batchify_fn) #! 内存泄漏
    83                                         
    84    354.4 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       i = 0
    85    679.8 MiB    308.9 MiB         101       for example in train_data_loader:
    86    679.9 MiB      5.9 MiB         101           i += 1

============================================================

    99    815.2 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       train_batch_sampler = BatchSampler(train_ds, batch_size=2, shuffle=True)
   100    815.2 MiB      0.0 MiB           1       train_data_loader = DataLoader(dataset=train_ds, batch_sampler=train_batch_sampler, num_workers=0, collate_fn=data_collator)
   101

   103    854.2 MiB     26.1 MiB         101       for example in train_data_loader:
   104    854.2 MiB      8.7 MiB         101           i += 1

```
可以看到`main_nlp_w_leak`在100次循环过程中，多出300M内存
`main_nlp_wo_leak`无论在多少次循环后，内存占用稳定较低

title: SentencePiece和 Byte-Pair-Encoding类型tokenizer的get_offset_mapping方法实现
body:
## 个人想了下这两种类型的tokenizer的get_offset_mapping。
XLNetTokenizer（SentencePiece）和GPTTokenizer的（byte-level Byte-Pair-Encoding）`get_offset_mapping`方法实现
```python
# 安装fastcore
# !pip install fastcore

from paddlenlp.transformers import XLNetTokenizer, GPTTokenizer
from fastcore.all import patch_to
from paddle.utils import try_import
from transformers import XLNetTokenizerFast, GPT2TokenizerFast

SENTENCEPIECE_UNDERLINE = "▁"
import unicodedata

@patch_to(XLNetTokenizer)
def get_offset_mapping(self, text):
    text = text.replace("``", '"').replace("''", '"')
    normalized_text, char_mapping = '', []
    for i, ch in enumerate(text):
        if not self.keep_accents:
            ch = unicodedata.normalize("NFKD", ch)
            if not unicodedata.combining(ch):
                normalized_text += ch
                char_mapping.extend([i] * len(ch))
        else:
            normalized_text += ch
            char_mapping.extend([i] * len(ch))

    if self.do_lower_case:
        normalized_text = normalized_text.lower()

    text, token_mapping, offset = normalized_text, [], 0
    split_tokens = self.tokenize(text)
    if split_tokens[0] == SENTENCEPIECE_UNDERLINE:
        split_tokens = split_tokens[1:]
        token_mapping.append((0,0))

    for token in split_tokens:
        if token[0] == SENTENCEPIECE_UNDERLINE:
            token=token[1:]

        if len(token) == 0:
            length = 1
        else:
            length = len(token)
            
        start = text[offset:].index(token) + offset
        end = start + length

        token_mapping.append(
            (char_mapping[start], char_mapping[end - 1] + 1))            
        offset = end

    return token_mapping

@patch_to(GPTTokenizer)
def get_offset_mapping(self, text):
    token_mapping = []
    global_offsets = 0
    re = try_import("regex")
    for token in re.findall(self.pat, text):
        newtokens = ""
        char2bpe = []
        for char_index, each_element in enumerate(token):
            for b in each_element.encode("utf-8"):
                newtokens += self.byte_encoder[b]
                char2bpe.append(char_index)

        cum_bpe_offset = 0
        for bpe_token in self.bpe(newtokens).split(" "):
            start = newtokens.index(bpe_token) + cum_bpe_offset
            end = start + len(bpe_token)
            new_start = char2bpe[start] + global_offsets
            new_end = char2bpe[end - 1] + global_offsets + 1
            if bpe_token[0] == "Ġ":
                new_start += 1
            token_mapping.append((new_start, new_end))
            cum_bpe_offset += len(bpe_token)
            newtokens = newtokens[len(bpe_token) :]

        global_offsets += len(token)

    return token_mapping
```
## 测试
```python
xlnet_pdtokenizer = XLNetTokenizer.from_pretrained("xlnet-base-cased")
xlnet_hgtokenizer = XLNetTokenizerFast.from_pretrained("xlnet-base-cased")

gpt2_pdtokenizer = GPTTokenizer.from_pretrained("gpt2-en")
gpt2_hgtokenizer = GPT2TokenizerFast.from_pretrained("gpt2")

# 数据来自squad1.1
data = {'id': '56f7c651aef2371900625bf5',
 'title': 'Martin_Luther',
 'context': "Martin Luther (/ˈluːθər/ or /ˈluːðər/; German: [ˈmaɐ̯tiːn ˈlʊtɐ] ( listen); 10 November 1483 – 18 February 1546) was a German professor of theology, composer, priest, former monk and a seminal figure in the Protestant Reformation. Luther came to reject several teachings and practices of the Late Medieval Catholic Church. He strongly disputed the claim that freedom from God's punishment for sin could be purchased with money. He proposed an academic discussion of the power and usefulness of indulgences in his Ninety-Five Theses of 1517. His refusal to retract all of his writings at the demand of Pope Leo X in 1520 and the Holy Roman Emperor Charles V at the Diet of Worms in 1521 resulted in his excommunication by the Pope and condemnation as an outlaw by the Emperor.",
 'question': 'Of what nationality was Martin Luther?',
 'answers': ['German', 'German', 'German'],
 'answer_starts': [39, 119, 119],
 'is_impossible': False}
text = data["context"]

# 比较gpt2的offset mapping。
# huggingface版本
for a,b in zip(gpt2_hgtokenizer(text,return_offsets_mapping=True)["offset_mapping"],gpt2_hgtokenizer.tokenize(text)):
    print(text[a[0]:a[1]],"======",b)
# paddle版本
for a,b in zip(gpt2_pdtokenizer.get_offset_mapping(text),gpt2_pdtokenizer.tokenize(text)):
    print(text[a[0]:a[1]],"======",b)

# 比较xlnet的offset mapping。
# huggingface版本
for a,b in zip(xlnet_hgtokenizer(text,return_offsets_mapping=True)["offset_mapping"],xlnet_hgtokenizer.tokenize(text)):
    print(text[a[0]:a[1]],"======",b)
# paddle版本
for a,b in zip(xlnet_pdtokenizer.get_offset_mapping(text),xlnet_pdtokenizer.tokenize(text)):
    print(text[a[0]:a[1]],"======",b)
```
# 注：
- xlnet和gpt2有关空格的offset mapping，本方法与huggingface略有不同。
- 可能存在其他问题，仅供参考~

title: bart-base模型精度问题
body:
在复现Pegasus时候，我参考了bart,这2个模型很相似。但是对齐bart精度时候，发现误差很大。麻烦你看看。
mean difference: tensor(1.0486, grad_fn=<MeanBackward0>)
max difference: tensor(11.2015, grad_fn=<MaxBackward1>)
huggingface facebook/bart-base vs paddle bart-base
----------------------------------------------------------
from paddlenlp.transformers import BartTokenizer as PDBartTokenizer, BartModel as PDBartModel
from transformers import BartTokenizer, BartModel
from transformers import BartModel as PTBartModel
import paddle
import torch
import os,sys
base_dir=os.path.dirname(__file__)

sys.path.append(os.path.join(base_dir,'paddlenlp'))  #临时修改环境变量
paddle.set_device("cpu")

model_list = [
    ("facebook/bart-base", "bart-base")
    # ("google/Bart-xsum", "ErnieForGeneration")
]
text = "Welcome to use paddle paddle and paddlenlp!"

for model in model_list:
    bart_tokenizer = BartTokenizer.from_pretrained(model[0])
    pt_decoder_input_ids = bart_tokenizer("Studies show that", return_tensors="pt").input_ids
    pt_input_ids = bart_tokenizer("Studies have been shown that owning a dog is good for you", return_tensors="pt").input_ids
    #
    pt_model = PTBartModel.from_pretrained(model[0])
    outputs = pt_model(input_ids=pt_input_ids, decoder_input_ids=pt_decoder_input_ids)
    pt_outputs = outputs.last_hidden_state
    #paddle
    pd_model = PDBartModel.from_pretrained(model[1])

    with paddle.no_grad():
        tokenizer = PDBartTokenizer.from_pretrained(model[1])
        inputs = tokenizer("Studies have been shown that owning a dog is good for you")["input_ids"]
        decoder_input_ids = tokenizer("Studies show that")["input_ids"]
        pd_decoder_input_ids = paddle.to_tensor([decoder_input_ids])
        pd_input_ids = paddle.to_tensor([inputs])
        pd_outputs = torch.from_numpy(pd_model(input_ids=pd_input_ids, decoder_input_ids=pd_decoder_input_ids).numpy())
    print("mean difference:", (pt_outputs - pd_outputs).abs().mean())
    print("max difference:", (pt_outputs - pd_outputs).abs().max())
    print(f"huggingface {model[0]} vs paddle {model[1]}")

title: Apply double to train transformer as default during full procedure
body:
<!-- Demo: https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/PaddleNLP/pull/26 -->
### PR types
<!-- One of [ New features | Bug fixes | Function optimization | Performance optimization | Breaking changes | Others ] -->
Others

### PR changes
<!-- One of [ Models | APIs | Docs | Others ] -->
Others

### Description
<!-- Describe what this PR does -->
Apply double to train transformer as default during full procedure. 
Transformer 训练 loss 在 float 下每两次训练存在小于 1e-6 误差，用 double 可以在 16 位有效数字对齐，经讨论，可以采用 double 执行全链条。
将全链条使用脚本移动到 `tests/` 路径下。

相对于 examples 下的脚本，修改部分在：
* train 脚本，默认设置训练精度 `paddle.set_default_dtype("float64")`
* train 脚本，`double` 训练完成后，将参数转成 `float` 再存储供后续动态图、预测库预测，因预测库 pass 不支持 `double` 类型
* modeling 脚本，`initializer.Assign()` 不支持 `double` 类型，经讨论，目前不需要监控静态图，遂直接采用 `set_value` 形式给 `position embedding weight` 赋值
* modeling 脚本，`functional.label_smooth()` 输出一定为 `float`，不支持设置 `dtype`，但当前情况下需要为 `double`，遂判断 `paddle.get_default_dtype()` 类型是否为 `float`，若否，加上 `paddle.cast`
